name: MO-MEN-TUM
description:
MO-MEN-TUM is a prototype top down shooter where momentum is everything. It's your speed, your damage, your health, even your rate of fire are all dependent on your momentum. 

Made for Quarantine Jam by Isaac Creswell

This is a Prototype I made for the jam but I plan on expanding into a much larger roguelike in the future. Please let me know of any bugs or feedback you have I would really appreciate it.

Most sound effects by rubberduck on open game art Link: https://opengameart.org/content/50-cc0-retro-synth-sfx

https://opengameart.org/content/punk-sound "Punk Sound" by bariq18 is licensed under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
